title: Nancy Drew 07 - Ghost Dogs of Moon Lake
description:
Ghost Dogs of Moon Lake is based on two books, Ghost Dogs of Whispering Oaks and Mystery by Moonlight. This is the seventh game in the series of Nancy Drew computer games. The game was released in 2002. This game has only 3 seeable suspects, unlike most other Nancy Drew games.

Plot

A friend of Nancy's dad, Sally McDonald, has fled from her house in terror. Every other night, a pack of ghost dogs with glowing eyes and mournful howls, which were believed to be owned by a gangster named Mickey Malone, were attacking her house, as he was a previous owner of the house. There is also a rumor in the area that Malone had gold buried on his property. In the game, Nancy attempts to find out if the ghosts dogs are actually ghosts and if not, who trained them to attack the house. She also tries to find the rumor of the gold. This game takes place in the fictional town of Moon Lake, Pennsylvania.
